I have gathered several quotes in your areas of interest. Here are the quotes for you:

1. Motivation: "The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams." - Eleanor Roosevelt
2. Love: "The best thing to hold onto in life is each other." - Audrey Hepburn
3. Success: "Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm." - Winston Churchill

These should provide you with a positive start to your day! 

Now, I will call the finish function to wrap this up.
